title: 01/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-There is a big leadership gap between LeBron James and Kevin Durant

-The Jaguars are a perfect fit for Urban Meyer

-Why aren't NFL teams trying to hire Nick Saban?

-The Chiefs title window isn't as wide open as people think


Guest: Greg Cosell, NFL Films


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
